mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( seq, id, attend_yn, lv_ffc_yn, state, work_time, reg_id, mod_id, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( ATTEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, '1', '0', #{state}, '0', #{regId}, #{modId}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET lv_ffc_time = sysdate, lv_ffc_yn = '1', state = #{state}, work_time = #{workTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id} AND seq = ( SELECT MAX(seq) FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )

UPDATE attendance SET lv_ffc_time = sysdate, lv_ffc_yn = '1', state = '2', work_time = #{workTime}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = sysdate WHERE id = #{id} AND seq = ( SELECT MAX(seq) FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, TO_CHAR(attend_time, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS attendTime, TO_CHAR(lv_ffc_time, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS leaveTime, attend_yn AS attendYN, lv_ffc_yn AS leaveYN, state, work_time AS workTime, reg_id AS regId, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDate, mod_id AS modId, TO_CHAR(mod_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS modDate FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY seq desc

SELECT seq, id, TO_CHAR(attend_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS attendTime, TO_CHAR(lv_ffc_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS leaveTime, DECODE(attend_yn,0,'출근 전',1,'완료') AS attendYN, DECODE(lv_ffc_yn,0,'퇴근 전',1,'완료') AS leaveYN, DECODE(state,0,'정상',1,'지각',2,'조퇴') AS state, work_time || '시간' AS workTime, reg_id AS regId, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS regDate, mod_id AS modId, CASE TO_CHAR(mod_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(mod_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS modDate, SUM(work_time) OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY seq) || '시간' AS workTimeSum FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') <= reg_date AND reg_date <= LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))

SELECT seq, id, TO_CHAR(attend_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS attendTime, TO_CHAR(lv_ffc_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS leaveTime, DECODE(attend_yn,0,'출근 전',1,'완료') AS attendYN, DECODE(lv_ffc_yn,0,'퇴근 전',1,'완료') AS leaveYN, DECODE(state,0,'정상',1,'지각',2,'조퇴') AS state, work_time || '시간' AS workTime, reg_id AS regId, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS regDate, mod_id AS modId, CASE TO_CHAR(mod_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(mod_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS modDate, SUM(ROUND(work_time)) OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY reg_date) || '시간' AS workTimeSum FROM attendance WHERE id = #{id} AND TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') <= reg_date AND reg_date <= LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))
